title: ISimulationForceFeatureData.SetFunctionStepValues
description: Sets the step function, whose magnitude transitions smoothly from one value to another value, for this Force feature.
signature:
System.Boolean SetFunctionStepValues( 
   System.Double
F1InitialValue
,
   System.Double
T1StartStepTime
,
   System.Double
F2InitialValue
,
   System.Double
T2EndStepTime
)

parameters.description: Time at which the step begins

parameters.name: F2InitialValue
parameters.description: Value of the function after the step

parameters.name: T2EndStepTime
parameters.description: Time at which the step ends

returns: True if the operation succeeds, false if it fails
